channel.title: Can you make a server from a labtop?
channel.description: Im asking casue i wanna make meh own server:)

item.source: Can you make a server from a labtop?

item.title: Can you make a server from a labtop?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

de dust89:

thats not much =\ you can buy it? it is not needed, it just will make you not lag as much =p you can’t host much with 256mb of RAM

No,
If you get a proper server based of a proper framework you can host a lot of people on a machine with that. The amount of RAM is important when hosting, its the speed!
Did you notice anything like DDR? There are many types, varying in speeds. Most PCs have DDR2 RAM nowadays however DDR3 is avaliable

Read full topic
item.source: Can you make a server from a labtop?
